Hello this is the registration page

I\'m your new exercise companion, here to guide and support you on your fitness journey. Let\'s create a personalized plan together to help you reach your goals. Whether you\'re starting out or aiming for the next level, I\'m here to make your fitness experience enjoyable and effective. Let\'s achieve your fitness goals together
Join our exercise community! Create an account today and start your fitness journey with us!
Kick off your journey with these exercises.

BMI is a useful measure of overweight and obesity. BMI is an estimate of body fat and a good gauge of your risk for diseases that can occur with more body fat. The higher your BMI, the higher your risk for certain diseases such as heart disease,high blood pressure, type 2 diabetes, gallstones, breathing problems, and certain cancers.
